351.心はポイズン。\n身体もポイズン。: The heart and body are poison.

375.また 素手で魔物を倒せば いいのかしら？\nこの階の魔物は はじめの階層より\n:
Will you beat monsters with your bare
hands again? Be careful, as the monsters
are more dangerous on this floor.

455.目には目をって ぶっそうよね。\n: An eye for an eye, as they say.

479.１００万倍の笑顔を 返そう。: Smile back a million times over.

501.石のこぶしをもちて ハサミを打ち砕け。\n一片の くもりなき心で 打つべし。\n:
With a fist of rock, smash scissors.
Become one with your heart and strike.

557.騎士たるもの 仕える王を守りつつ\n相手を攻めるべし。\n手本となる 騎士に 攻:
As a knight, it is your duty to protect
your king. Become an example of both
offense and defense.

626.ボク あついのは 好きじゃないよ。: I goo not like the heat!

652.素手で魔物を倒せば いいみたいね。\n武器を身に付けるのは ダメって ことかしら:
Seems you must defeat monsters with your
bare hands. Maybe weapons are no good?

712.緑のアイツを 見ると 心がドクドクする。\nこの感情を 深く知るには\n彼らと:
My heart pounds when I see that green goo.
I wonder how we can feel what they are
feeling?

793.上は 大火事。下も 大火事。\nな～んだ？:
Fire from above and fire from below.
How, I wonder?

823.ボクは 相撲が大好き。\n相撲をしてるとき 呼んでくれたなら\nいつでも かけつ:
I love sumo wrestling. If you call me while
you are doing so, I will surely come.

899.回復しながら戦う これぞ いやしの極意。\n回復呪文のプロに いやしの極意を見て:
Recovering while fighting is the art of healing.
Show me how a professional healer does it.

963.葬送は 平穏な心のままで。: A funeral that keeps your mind at ease.

983.格闘家の心得。\n相手の得意技を 受けて勝て。\nそれが 最強への唯一の道。耐え:
The way of martial arts is enduring your
opponent's most powerful techniques and winning.
You must endure.

1042.ネタは ふくろに ぶち込もう。: Put a punchline into the bag.

1065.戦いに 言葉は 不要。\n静けさをもって 勝利を得よ。:
Words are meaningless in battle.
Victory comes with silence.

1104.気分屋の囚人と なかよくなるには\nときにやさしく ときにきびしく\n根気よく:
The only way to get along with fickle prisoners
is to negotiate gently, harshly, and patiently.
Winning them over is the key.

1172.のろいはこわい のろいはおそい\nぼくがのろいで きみはのろい\nぼくは きみよ:
You are cursed, and I am slow.
Only then can you deliver the final blow.

1241.本当は なめられるのが\n好きなんじゃないかしら？: They really like being licked, don't they?

1277.いやされながら戦う これぞ いやしの極意。\n回復呪文のプロに いやしの極意を見:
Recovering while fighting is the art of healing.
Show me how a professional healer does it.

1440.鋼鉄すらも 切り裂く 片手のつるぎにて\n鋼の身体を持つ者たちを倒せ。:
With a sword that cuts through iron, defeat
those with bodies of iron.

1491.いやしの恵みを 受ける者同士で戦え。\nいやしを極めし者を倒し いやしの極意をつ:
Fight amongst those who receive a blessing of
healing. Defeat the masters of healing to truly
grasp it.

1554.暗やみの中 先が 見えずとも\n己のこうげきで かげを討て。:
Though you cannot see ahead in the darkness,
strike back still.

1597.王たる器を 見せつけ\nすべての王族たちに 一番の王だと証明せよ。:
Show them your greatness as a ruler. Prove to
all royalty that you are a ruler above all
others.

1662.青いアイツは 赤色吐息。\n赤いアイツは 青色吐息。\n頭で考えず心で受けよ 雑:
The blue one has red breath.
The red one has blue breath.
Do not think with your head, feel with your
heart, and have a clear mind.

1825.ぎんで身を守り ぎんのマントと毛皮を捧げよ。:
Don yourself with silver, and offer the
silver cloak and the silver pelt.

1859.氷の爆弾。\n冷やして爆破しろ。: An ice bomb. Cool off and explode it.

1881.わが必殺の剣技 その身に受けてみよ。: Receive all my sword arts unto your body.

1909.勇ましく叫べ 魂の叫びを聞け。: Shout valiantly and hear my soul roar.

1932.相手が道化師なら 芸で勝負をつけようか。: Shall we trick the clowns with our own tricks?

1963.うちの子にイオナズンを 教えてください。\n１回でわからなければ ２回お願いしま:
Please teach the little one Kaboom. If they
don't get it the first time, do it once more.

2025.ドラゴンどもを 強烈ないちげきで倒す。\nそれがドラゴンスレイヤー。\n:
He who defeats dragons with powerful blows
shall be known as the Dragon Slayer.

2075.し の亡者に し を。: The four shall live no more.

2301.邪悪な『ダークファイアーズ』様の お通りだぁ！\n炎の使い手は かかってこいやぁ:
I am the evil being, the great "Dark Fire"!
You dare challenge the master of the flame?!
Prepare yourself, for I am perfectly attuned with
the heat of battle! Tremble in despair!!

2397.サイコーにしびれた さけびを\nオレに 聞かせてくれ！:
Your biggest and best shout! Come on,
let me hear it!

2436.互いの命が どくどく 削れていく……。\n:
Both of our lives are just slowly withering
away...

2466.ぼくは はちが大好きなんだな\nキレイにはじける 光のはち\n身体にまきつける:
I just looooove bees...they way they
sparkle in the light when they fly, the
white pollen stuck to their fuzzy bodies...
I want to see all kinds of them!

2554.みえざれど 逃げず\nいわざれど 逃げず\nサルものは 逃がさず:
Though unseen, do not run.
Though unspoken, do not run.
Do not let the money escape.

2598.血塗られた殺し屋に 赤き巨大な火球で\nトドメをさせ。己の命も赤く燃やせ。:
To the bloodstained assassin, deliver the final
blow by unleashing a giant red ball of fire.
Allow your life to burn to the reaches of
crimson as well.

2652.ケバケバしくて 派手な色 チョーサイコー！\n私はもっと ブレイクして 天高く羽:
Sparkly and flashy colors are totally awesome!
I'll break through even more and soar to even
higher heights! Now, give that sparkly thing to
me!

2748.すっころんでも たてる\nたてるけど たてない:
Even if you fall, you must stand.
Stand once again, but without a
shield in hand.

2781.聖なる光で 冥府を照らせ\n祝福の光で 死を超えよ:
Illuminate the underworld with sacred light,
transcend death with a blessing from above.

2817.浮かない顔の お月様\n１００万点のスマイルで\nどっと大笑い！:
That moon with a somber-looking face,
with a smile of a million, bursts into a
laugh!

2861.風雷のチカラを まといて\n黄色い 風雷の悪魔を倒せ。:
Adorned with the power of wind and thunder,
defeat the yellow fiend of wind and thunder.

2900.己のテンションをあげて\n一心不乱の一撃で 鬼を打ち倒せ。:
Raise your own tension, and as you become
one with yourself, deliver a single blow to the
foul demon.

2942.最近 水質が悪くて 困っちゃう。\n部屋の黒カビを 渦巻で流して キレイにしてね:
The water quality has been bad lately, and it's
troubling...use powerful, swirling currents to
wash away clean the black mold.

3002.ボクは 目が回って ぐーるぐる\nキミは ぶんぶん回って ぐーるぐる\nぐるぐる:
My head's spinning, spin spin!
You're spinning too, spin spin!
Spin, spin, spin to win!

3073.ボクのアタマを なでてモジャ！\nそしたら みんなで おどるモジャー！\nおどり:
Pat my head, then let's all dance together!
If I get knocked down while dancing, that's
great!

3159.いやしの恵みを 受けている\n赤き騎士と 赤きいやし手を\nいやされながら 倒せ:
Receive the blessing of healing, and defeat
the knight of red and the healer of red
while yourself is healing.

3216.アツめで 夜露死苦！: Hot and intense! Dark and evil!
